text: {{Infobox Writer | name = Francisco de Quevedo | image = Don francisco de quevedo-villegas.jpg | caption = Francisco de Quevedo, after a painting by R. Ximeno. | birth_date = | birth_place = Madrid, Spain | death_date = | death_place = Villanueva de los Infantes, Spain | life = | occupation = Poet, politician | movement = Conceptismo | genre = | notableworks = }} Francisco Gómez de Quevedo y Santibáñez Villegas (Madrid, 14 September 1580 – Villanueva de los Infantes, 8 September 1645) was a nobleman, politician and writer of the Spanish Golden Age. == References == Category:Spanish poets Category:Writers from Madrid Category:1580 births Category:1645 deaths
title: Francisco de Quevedo
